name: Sacrifice wars
description:
There is a war between creatures of evil and another evil. Unfortunately your evil can't win without your help. Even more unfortunately the only thing you can do is sacrifice these creatures to help them win the big war.

Sacrifice your army to gain long term advantages, lead your team to victory.

Controls:

- Drag and drop one creature onto another using mouse

- R to restart

Assets used:

Art by 0x72 (https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii)

Music: Spooky Dungeon by Memoraphile @ You're Perfect Studio

Sound FX: Kenney.nl

Particle effects: Pixel Arsenal by Archanor VFX

Made for spooktober jam 2021, theme: Sacrifice
